SELECT vs.space_id, vs.name, vs.logo, vst.app_type, if(vs.pre_deletion_time IS NULL, 0, 1) pre_deleted, IF(vs.owner = m.id, 1, 0) admin, IF(m.`is_point` = 1, 1, 0) point, IF(vstb.id IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) enabled, IF(vst.id IS NOT NULL, vst.platform, 0) AS platform FROM vika_space vs JOIN vika_unit_member m ON vs.space_id = m.space_id AND m.is_deleted = 0 AND m.user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN vika_social_tenant_bind vstb ON vstb.space_id = vs.space_id LEFT JOIN vika_social_tenant vst ON vst.tenant_id = vstb.tenant_id AND vst.`status` = 1 AND ((vstb.app_id is NULL ) OR (vst.app_id = vstb.app_id)) WHERE vs.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY m.updated_at, m.`status`, vs.space_id ORDER BY m.updated_at DESC, m.`status` DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM vika_space vs JOIN vika_unit_member vum ON vs.space_id = vum.space_id AND vs.owner = vum.id AND vum.user_id = #{userId} AND vum.is_deleted = 0 WHERE vs.is_deleted = 0

SELECT t.owner memberId, u.code as areaCode, u.mobile_phone AS mobile, u.email, m.member_name, t.name spaceName FROM vika_space t JOIN vika_unit_member m ON t.space_id = m.space_id AND t.owner = m.id AND m.is_deleted = 0 JOIN vika_user u ON m.user_id = u.id AND u.is_deleted = 0 WHERE t.space_id = #{spaceId} AND t.is_deleted = 0
